document.full_text: china has agreed to take a number of steps to level the playing field for american firms, especially in the area of government procurement, a senior u.s. treasury official said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. says china agrees steps to level playing field
lines_and_colors: china has agreed to take a number of steps to level the playing field for american firms, especially in the area of government procurement, a senior u.s. treasury official said on tuesday.
